snippet.title: Moon Runner  | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Moon Runner is an atmospheric survival shooter set on a small moon. As a unit deployed by Astral Cortex Industries, you must restart the moon's infrastructure by finding the monoliths across the lunar landscape. Use lost and crafted modules to traverse the dangerous terrain and deal with leftover droids corrupted by an ominous presence below the surface.

It's is available for free on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1755240/Moon_Runner/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/fractalint
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/Fractal_Interactive/
